amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would create a Federal tax or fee on carbon emissions.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 350 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 350 proposed by Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S1846-1847, S1868; text: CR S1846) To create a point of order against legislation that would create a Federal tax or fee on carbon emissions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 350 proposed by Senator Blunt.
